name: Bikeep Free Bike Parking at BART
description: Free secure bike parking at select BART stations
fullDescription: Bikeep smart bike racks at select BART stations provide free secure bike parking. The racks feature industrial-grade steel locking arms and electronic security with zero theft incidents reported across 1 million parking sessions.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free secure bike parking at select BART stations
- Smart locking arm secures frame and wheel
- 24-hour maximum continuous parking
- Industrial-grade security with alarm system
- Works with registered Clipper card
howToGetIt:
1. Register online at bikehub.com (takes 30 seconds)
2. Link your physical Clipper card to your account
3. Find an available Bikeep rack at the station
4. Tap your Clipper card to lock your bike
5. Tap again to unlock when returning
keywords: Bikeep, free bike parking, BART, secure, Clipper, smart rack, bicycle, bike commute, BikeHub
